title: The owner shall have to declare the intension for developing the plot for AH/R&R initially
clause_text: The owner shall have to declare the intension for developing the plot for AH/R&R initially. The AH/R&R shall be marked on the plan clearly with note, “to be handed over to MCGM’’.
section: Development of AH/R&Ron private plot or plot of authority other than Govt./MCGM/Appropriate Authority.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The owner shall have to declare the intension for developing the plot for AH/R&R initially. The AH/R&R shall be marked on the plan clearly with note, “to be handed over to MCGM’’.
